data.message: Just wanted to thank you ever so much for all the pictures I'm able to save on Facebook. Also thank you for bringing up my pictures from the past. I have so many fond memories of my family and friends. Facebook is better than a picture album. I can carry all my pictures here on Facebook and never have to carry those heavy albums around with me. LOL I have them all here saved on Facebook and can see them whenever I want. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you. I love Facebook! Xoxoxo
